scene.name: intro
scene.line: What the brochure calls an "`epic laceration to the very heart of the world, certainly left by some great power â€” perhaps a casualty in a battle between god and dinosaur`" is more of a rocky valley separating the road from a sheer cliff-face.

It's difficult to see how deep it runs, as the rock slopes into shadow, but the few dozen lanterns strung across at an interval suggest its scale: larger than a basketball court, but smaller than a financial district.
